document.full_text: nearly three miles of steel fencing marking the mexico border in nogales is being replaced with a taller barrier that will be more difficult to breach and help reduce attacks on agents, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: arizona border city gets new mexico fence
lines_and_colors: nearly three miles of steel fencing marking the mexico border in nogales is being replaced with a taller barrier that will be more difficult to breach and help reduce attacks on agents, authorities said on wednesday.
